attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Gary Newlove's killer were sentenced to 'life' in prison. only to be released in 17 years or less. We need a real deterrant for these feral youths and other cold blooded killers.  I'm not requesting the death penalty in all cases, only where the evidence is clear cut and the killer(s) have shown no remorse; like in the case of Gary Newlove.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
